content: **note** foundation - chain 12 - is missing from directions this pattern is extremely similar to open chain loop snowflake 1 from bh&g but there are differences what you need -pearl cotton -size 8 steel crochet hook -blunt-end yarn needle -waxed paper -7-inch piece of plastic foam -stiffy glue -rustproof straight pins 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/open-chain-loop-snowflake
